CustomField.description: Month Name Based on the Start Date of the Time Record Period
CustomField.formula: CASE(MONTH(Time_Record_Period__r.Start_Date__c ), 1, "01. Jan",2, "02. Feb", 3, "03. Mar", 4, "04. Apr", 5, "05. May", 6, "06. Jun", 7, "07. Jul", 8, "08. Aug", 9, "09. Sep", 10, "10. Oct", 11, "11. Nov", 12, "12. Dec", "None")
CustomField.label: Month Name Start
